Html:
Hi

I have a simple Line graph with 6 lines added.  I want to be able to offer Autoranging for each axis idependantly, i.e. I might want to have the Y Axis change scale according to the min and max data, but the x stay still at a set point.  Is there a way of doing this easily or do I have to loop round all of the data finding the max and min each time?

Thanks

Mark.

Hi Mark,

use yAxis.SetConversion(....) and use viewPort.Visible to fix x axis limits.

Regards

Ravi

Hi Ravi,

I tried your suggestion and C# tells me yAxis does not include the method SetConvertion(...)

Could you explain why to me ,please ?

thanks !

sumgmin.

Hi,

you may be missing namespace I guess. Namespace is

using Microsoft.Research.DynamicDataDisplay.Charts;
﻿My yAxis is "VerticalAxis" and this is derived from "﻿﻿NumericAxis". I used 0.34703.0.

Regards

Ravi
Hi SetConversion does not exist in VerticalAxis class :( can you please tell me how did you solve this or did you have such a problem actually?
